title: Drawing, "Mark Cross Logo, Textile Design", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined
description: On black background, a Mark Cross logo pattern consisting of lower case M's and C's, dots and chess-horse heads in white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mark Cross Logo, Textile Design", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-28.
